name: Looney Tunes: Acme Arsenal
summary: Tag-team with the Tunes in the fight for their lives! Wield a major arsenal of ACME weapons as the tunes team-up to hunt down the mad scientist, chasing him through exotic locals from the past, present and future.Unite Bugs, Taz, Daffy, Marvin and more in a co-operative whack-and-smash romp through time - including online play!Melee and projectile weapons: Each character's weapon/melee skills can power up three times on the fly as you go.Vehicle Based Action: Race a jet scooter across an alien environment or wage battle on top of a giant flying Pterodactyl...the possibilities are endless!Travel to various locations such as Camelot, Ancient Egypt, Mars, the Wild West and more!Top-notch voice talent provides the characters with their classic voices and an authentic Looney Tunes slapstick adventure, while giving their look an updated, next-generation, modern edge.
